name: Cutezilla
description:
This was just a 3 day project I made for my sister as a silly present.

She drew me this really cute and weird character for my birthday and I thought why not turn it into a silly game?

Cute little boy

 You can't lose in this game. The playtime is about 20 seconds. 

Let's share our passion and love for games on discord! 

https://discord.gg/wwwR4Wr

You can listen to the music here:

https://soundcloud.com/zizhen96/8bit-woke
